name: Survive the Night (DavveCze, gDeSy)
description:
Hi, this our first official game. Its Hardcore survival game where your goal is to survive  24 hours, you need to gather resources and keep your fire alive! If you die you will die forever. Goodluck with surviving!

More content will be added in the coming weeks, features what we planning: farming, crafting, building, options menu & saving, better UI, more animations and sounds, pets & wild animals and more! Many thanks for every donation :) 

Just hope you will like it, DarkHounds Studios
